name: Upload files to eFileCabinet from newly created or updated files in Microsoft SharePoint Online
description:
This template periodically checks for newly created or updated files in Microsoft SharePoint Online and uploads that files to eFileCabinet. 

Note! The integration is built based on the file name, if a file is renamed it will be uploaded to eFileCabinet as a new file. 

The template is scheduled to run every hour. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
